welcome-banner.title: You can count on Insurance MECH!
welcome-banner.description: Our commitment is to your peace of mind and well-being at every stage of your life.
welcome-banner.about: We are a health and life insurance agency dedicated to providing you with the solution that fits your needs. Our advice is unbiased, personalized and independent: we work with all Medicare Advantage and ACA (Afordable Care Act) companies, known as Obama Care. We help you opt for better benefits at no additional cost!
welcome-banner.about-secondary: In addition, we have a varied portfolio of products so that you are always protected in each and every stage of your life.
welcome-banner.about-final: Choosing the right plan can be difficult, count on us!

about-banner.title: Why choose us?
about-banner.item-one-description: We have experts working for you and your needs.
about-banner.item-two-description: Your life has many facets and we have a plan for each one of them.
about-banner.item-three-description: You are different from others, we will adjust to your lifestyle.
about-banner.item-four-description: We will work together to provide you with the security you need.
